summary: A marketing app with the package/URL ID com.paramshopping.app (Param Shopping).
imageRequirements:
## Required Images
- Vibrant shopping bag logo with a stylized 'P' monogram in warm orange tones on a clean white background (param-shopping-logo.dim_256x256.png)
- Wide marketing hero banner with abstract shopping and retail elements, warm gradient background in coral and orange tones (hero-banner.dim_1440x600.png)

existing_features.title: Create a marketing landing page for 'Param Shopping' (app ID: com.paramshopping.app) that includes a hero section with the app name and tagline, a features/benefits section highlighting the shopping app's key value propositions, a call-to-action section (e.g., 'Download Now' or 'Get Started'), and a footer with the app ID branding.

Apply a vibrant, modern e-commerce visual theme to the marketing app using warm accent colors (e.g., orange/red/coral tones), clean sans-serif typography, and a layout that feels energetic and trustworthy. Enforce the theme consistently across all sections.

new_feature_requests.summary: Create a marketing app with package ID com.paramshopping.app
Store and expose basic marketing content (app name, tagline, feature list, CTA text) from the backend so the frontend can fetch and render it dynamically.
